name: Snigdha Das
body:
### About Me
I am a PhD student at the [Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur](http://cse.iitkgp.ac.in/). I am working under the supervision of [Dr. Bivas Mitra](http://cse.iitkgp.ac.in/~bivasm/) and [Dr. Sandip Chakraborty](http://cse.iitkgp.ac.in/~sandipc/). My research interest lies in Activity Sensing. I am part of [Complex Network Research Group](http://www.cnergres.iitkgp.ac.in/).

### Academic Details
I have completed M.S. by research from [Indian Institute of technology, Kharagpur](http://www.iitkgp.ac.in/) in 2015 and B.Tech from [West Bengal University of Technology](http://www.wbut.ac.in/) in 2010.

### Work Experience
I have two years (July 2010 - Sep 2012) of work experience from [Computer Sciences Corporation India](http://www.csc.com/in).  

### Contact
EmailID: snigdha00582[at]gmail[dot]com
